name: Inazuma Souls
summary: Inazuma Souls is a hackrom of Inazuma Eleven 1 focused on difficulty and being much more challenging than the base games. Besides, it is a hackrom with +1000 players that can be signed, including players from all the sagas and custom players. It also has a postgame with many secrets and a very high difficulty, a unique experience when playing Inazuma Eleven.
